imdb.plot outline: When Mia realizes that she is suffering from Breast Cancer and must go through an expensive surgery that will cost her her breast, Her husband Thomas begins to lose affection for her and stops supporting her. Now Mia must learn to accept her new self and live her new life.
imdb.title: True Beauty-PSA
